name: Kessler Wrestler
description:
After decades of sending junk into space, humanity has turned to its last savior to restore balance to the cosmos. They call it, the Kessler Wrestler.

Take control of a brave robot and single-handedly protect humanity from dangerous space debris from Earth orbit all the way to Saturn's rings.

Features:

  • Battle space debris across various regions such as Earth and Mars.
  • Be a space robot that can literally grab satellites with its hands.
  • Run out of battery and die if you're careless about power consumption. 

This game is in development so bear in mind that some things may not be working perfectly yet and/or missing.

Discord Server: https://discord.gg/7aRyQN9CjV

Twitter: https://twitter.com/KesslerWrestler
